pull.title: guix: reduce allowed exported symbols
pull.body: Need to double-check, but pretty sure this is atleast partly from #33181.

events.body:
> pretty sure this is atleast partly from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33181.

FWIW i cherry-picked commit 7b90b4f5bb10e2156709b07e3996f867e2421232 on top of b354d1ce5c47997aa2f93910e05c0f8daa8736eb (the commit before #33181). A full guix build finished succesfully. So it must have been something earlier even!

Nice, ACK 7b90b4f5bb10e2156709b07e3996f867e2421232

Also did a guix build.

> > pretty sure this is atleast partly from #33181.
> 
> FWIW i cherry-picked commit [7b90b4f](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/7b90b4f5bb10e2156709b07e3996f867e2421232) on top of [b354d1c](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/b354d1ce5c47997aa2f93910e05c0f8daa8736eb) (the commit before #33181). A full guix build finished succesfully. So it must have been something earlier even!

The `_fini` and `_init` symbols have no longer been exported since commit b5fc6d46a3854c18f6e8dfc89540d24ef778caa2 in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29987.

> > pretty sure this is atleast partly from #33181.
> 
> FWIW i cherry-picked commit [7b90b4f](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/7b90b4f5bb10e2156709b07e3996f867e2421232) on top of [b354d1c](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/b354d1ce5c47997aa2f93910e05c0f8daa8736eb) (the commit before #33181). A full guix build finished succesfully. So it must have been something earlier even!

The `environ`, `_environ` and `__environ` symbols have no longer been exported since commit e821f0a37a026fa0480c7f6f6c938da7c77e0d52 in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/30454.
